item.title: Why I made a website
item.description: \ Raison d’Ãªtre Creating this website has been on my list of things to do for an embarrassingly long time. I worked on it in fits–first in July 2020 and again recently when I started over using Hugo and bookdown in order to more easily accommodate .Rmd files. Now that it’s finally live, I thought I’d say a couple things about what I hope to accomplish here. \ Having a website that showcases personal data projects seems useful to my professional development.
